text: LAxis is now Axis, Axis3D is the axis object shown in a 3D camera scene, such as the one within LScene. Axis2D was the 2D equivalent to Axis3D but has been removed since Axis is better in every way and works in layouts. 3D axes don't work that well in layouts so there is not yet a special layoutable for that, hence LScene as a layoutable simple scene
